title: Cybersecurity Expert Training Program Utilizing Playable Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Computer Systems and Network Concepts Understanding
context.additional_context: Beginner-focused training for healthcare/legal/technical professionals, implementing simulation-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more risk factors by analyzing actual cybersecurity incident scenarios.
Learners can accurately perform cybersecurity response procedures with over 80% accuracy through collaborative role-based team activities.
Learners can improve their career interest in cybersecurity by at least 3 points on a 5-point scale after training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
